bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, double butted ORE DT and TT, forged/releived HT and ISCG BB, 6mm offset rear triangle and forged horizontal drop-outs w/ integrated chain tensioners, replaceable hanger

components.description: Marzocchi DJ 3.5 SL, 100mm, 32mm alloy stanchions and 1 1/8" steerer, coil spring w/ air assist, rebound adjustment, magnesium lowers, standard axle dropout
Truvativ Hussefelt, forged alloy, 31.8mm, 0 degree rise
Alloy OS, 640mm wide, 45mm rise, 8 degree back, 6 degree up sweep
Hayes Sole, hydraulic disc, 6" v-cut rotors
Hayes Sole, hydraulic disc, 6" v-cut rotors
Truvativ Hussefelt, forged 6066, 175mm, Howitzer spline w/ pedal thread inserts
34S w/ poly bash guard and ISCG mounted TV box guide
Truvativ Howitzer XR, sealed cartridge bearings, 73mm Shell for 52mm chainline
Specialized/Alex HRD 26, double wall disc w/ eyelets
Specialized P.Disc, CNC high flanges and disc mounts, 36h, nutted 3/8" axle
Specialized P.Disc, cassette, CNC high flanges and disc mounts, 36h, nutted 3/8" axle
Chain stay protector, reflectors, owners manual
